titles.title: Electing Members to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects certain named Majority Members to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct, including the Chairman.
